name: wolfslice
text: Philipe's smile in the last frame makes the strip

name: ambala
text: this smile goes to 11.

name: especial
text: You're on 10, where can you go from there? Where?

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: Indeed, his smile does make the strip.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: A comment left by godfatherofsouls was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Pox, madnes, professorhazard, EM2, rowboat, luckypyjamas)

name: em2
text:
I will see this face now when I try to go to bed.

AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH

name: gunsofray
text: Pedophillia is a crime.

name: sparhawk
text: In a way I rue the greater level of expression he's acquired.

name: atilla
text: It's his smile, combined with Teodore's expression of horror that makes the strip.

name: mortshire
text: in which philippe learns a valuable trick.

name: chaesar
text: I particularly enjoy how the stick dents Mr. Bear's ear.

name: foetus_punch
text: That actually disturbs me greatly, because I really don't like bendy cartilage.

name: gormster
text: He's a teddy bear. It's just stuffing and material.

name: razorman57
text: then you would be a coward who would desert a dying man

name: re5urgam
text: When I first saw this strip, I remember just looking at that dent in his ear, without reading the dialogue or looking at either of the surrounding panels. It is really splendid.

name: pants
text: A comment left by pants was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by LDM, rowboat, TheQuietYou)

name: johnnygeo
text: I assumed he was recalling a past penicillin shot, possibly arising from a youthful indiscretion

name: gazdatronik
text: It may have something to do with something that happened to him while in the RAF

name: a_dude
text: chubbies all around.

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: this reminds me of how my boyfriend talks in base-16 in his sleep.

name: relaxing
text: zzzzzz0xcafebabedeadbeefzzzzzzzzzz

name: farqussus
text: is that supposed to say cafe babe dead beef as well as being base16, or is that just AN AMAZING COINCIDENCE?

name: coconutjohn
text: i do the same thing

name: sticks
text: These could be clues to Mr. Bear's mysterious past.

name: brzbee
text: The first strip to make me laugh aloud.

name: geysershitdick
text: A comment left by geysershitdick was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by MrMojoRisin, lawbot, mashisoyo, grayestnova, goocifer, rowboat, L_C_B, crumpetsandtea, cailetshadow, usversusthem, dropkickpikachu, Tibia, mattylite, neitherman, philosophe)

name: dropkickpikachu
text: Uhh...

name: cailetshadow
text:
Where I come from...it is definitely called a strip. A panel is one frame of the strip. A "strip" is one installment of a series of panels, and is interchangeable with the word "comic". I am sure the internet will back us all up here.

Flying off the handle over insignificant details is silly. And when you are wrong, it is even sillier.

name: ketelcat
text: Chubby for that statement =D

name: ted0phile
text: Ouch, no chubbies.

name: saint
text:
Some people link dignity to incorrectly correcting people on Internet terminology.
Some people link dignity to writing shitty music and being an egotistical humanitarian.

Some people don't give a Michael J. Fox-shaped vibrator about either.

name: fishies
text: The mattress and bed look a lot nicer than they used to. Cornelius, you're moving up in the world! I think he's still repaying his massive heroin debt he wracked up earlier in life.

name: stwee
text: i think he's flashing back to prison time, sounds like the kind of thing someone might make as a murder weapon with limited tools or options

name: deusoma
text: In what prison, exactly, do the prisoners have easy access to liquid sourdough bread?

name: foetus_punch
text: In the prison that the government uses to imprison mad scientists and forces them to create strange things. Liquid sourdough bread was incorporated into an experiment, but then Connie Bear looked at Big Cackle the wrong way and...this fantasy scenario is so ludicrous, I'm done.

name: tekende
text: Chubby for the effort, though.

name: gunpistolmanxk
text: My god, I just started reading this comic and this was the first one to make me burst out laughing.

name: snowman
text: 5.  I'm a sucker for the surreal.

name: ryanfuss
text: It would be funny to think that Mr. Bear had an allergy to syringes at this point. Or even an immense fear of crusts...even if they were liquified.

name: radarjammer
text:
zzzz

Whuh...? What is that, a probe? Stop that, I say! Oh, alright...

zzzz

name: mrchuckletrouzd
text: I like that Phillipe might actually be smiling all the time. The only change in his expression in the end when he is further pleased is that his natural smile lines extend a bit.
